alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson; Mellette (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 6:53PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Mellette, southeastern Jackson and northeastern Bennett Counties through 745 PM MDT/845 PM CDT/... At 653 PM MDT/753 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over George Town, or 16 miles south of Kadoka, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Long Valley around 705 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Corn Creek, Norris and Black Pipe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
